$General Douglas$
You should report to Bishop Ignacio stuff that you had seen or heard
(You must talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
While you were chasing the Black Knight, I tried to convince the other nobles and the King, but...
There have been troubles inside and outside of Saint Haven recently, so I was told that it is difficult to provide troops support.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Anyway, What is the name of blond swordsman, who was with lady Argenta?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Moreover, I heard the Black Knight's name is Velskud.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
That interesting.. Ge..r..aint?
Well.. I'm not surprise at all as blond hair babies who was born after the Dragon Raid 50 years ago are commonly name after Geraint.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You don't have to look at them as the heroes from 50 years ago.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Velskud? Did you say the Black Knight's name is Velskud?
Argenta, Geraint, and Velskud... Haha... Well, is that mean Dragon Reid's driving forces from 50 years ago are congregating here again?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What? Is it different than the truth? Are you saying that they are the real heroes?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Oh.. Actually what the public had heard about the news of Dragon Raid 50 years ago was quite different from the truth. Especially, only a few people know about the truth of Geraint and Velskud except those six heroes...

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hmm... Dear {user_nick}, if the Black Knight is the hero , Velskud from 50 years ago, then you soon will be known the truth.

$Bishop Ignacio$
But, currently people know Velskud as a hero who bravely died in Dragon Raid 50 years ago.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Unfortunately, if people found out the truth of Velskud, then it will throw the nation into chaos. So please remain silent about the Black Knight to people. Let's solve this issue as quickly as possible before the rumor goes around.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:talk}
Thank you for your understanding.
But we are facing a big situation right now, and we do not have any solution to chase the Black Knight's hiding place... What a bad situation to be in.

$Bishop Ignacio$
I wonder what will General Douglas say about this issue?
Perhaps he already had a solution in mind. Why don't you go talk to him?

$General Douglas$
You should report to Bishop Ignacio about what you had seen or heard.
(You must talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Bishop Ignacio${action:talk}
Talk to General Douglas, the commander of troops, to find the solution.
We cant give up just like this.

$General Douglas${action:talk}
You make a big contribution for the dispatch of troops.
I didn't truely believe when you said you are the guardian of Calderock Village. But I have to acknowledge that you are the true gaurdian of Calderock Village.

$General Douglas$
We can say we achieved some result because we grasped the Black Knight's main base.
But we have not found the Prophet yet...

$General Douglas$
I am going to assume that you already know we cannot simply enter the The Dark Overlord Keep's Guards because everyone will be annihilated.
But we cannot just wait here and do nothing. Let's go find other path to get in.

$General Douglas$
Yes. I am going to dispatch troops continuously to Dark Overlord Keep to defeat monsters. And at the same time, I am going to find the other path so that our troops can enter The Fortress of the Dark Overlord Army.
So while we are in that process, we are going to search if there is the path that we can enter in.

$General Douglas$
Would you?
Then I will give you a mission separately.

$General Douglas$
As you see Worshiper Brethren Fire Mages at Dark Overlord Keep already, they are very nettlesome monsters to fight.
They summons Flame Wings endlessly to significantly damage our troops' strength.

$General Douglas$
Therefore, in order us to push later, we have to defeat Worshiper Brethren Fire Mages who summons Flame Wings as much as possible. I would like to give you this mission.
You would encounter difficulties thus you are able to take our troops with you to defeat 10 Worshiper Brethren Fire Mages.

$General Douglas${action:talk}
You are very reliable.
I would be expanding the troops and securing goods, I wish you good luck!

$General Douglas$
In order us to push later, we have to defeat Worshiper Brethren Fire Mages who summons Flame Wings as many as possible. I would like to give you this mission.
You would encounter difficulties thus you are able to take our troops with you to defeat 10 Worshiper Brethren Fire Mages.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:talk}
Are you talking about Worship Brethren Fire Mages at Dark Overlord Keep? I would be a difficult situation, thus It will be helpful if there is such a brave man like you to help defeat those monster as much as you can

$General Douglas$
Oh, {user_nick} , you are here!
Because of your great performance in many ways, I am able to move troops more easily.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So can we now chase the Black Knight?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$General Douglas$
We have thoroughly investigated Dark Overlord Keep and found out efficient routes. From now on, we can fight with minimum loss to our troops.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>
